meanings.definition: Gathered closely together in a group
meanings.sent1: The clustered stars shone brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The clustered flowers created a beautiful bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The clustered ants worked together to carry the food back to their nest.
meanings.sent4: The clustered clouds resembled fluffy cotton balls in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The clustered trees provided a cool shade on a hot summer day.
